pageProps.html:
Binary Search

Description

doc

Solutions

First Idea

/**
 * @param {number[]} nums
 * @param {number} target
 * @return {number}
 */
var search = function (nums, target) {
  let low = 0
  let high = nums.length - 1

  while (low <= high) {
    const middle = low + Math.floor((high - low) / 2)
    const middleValue = nums[middle]

    if (middleValue === target) {
      return middle
    }

    middleValue < target ? (low = middle + 1) : (high = middle - 1)
  }

  return -1
}
  • Time Complexity: O(logn)
  • Space Complexity: O(1)
